basic_info.description: As a seasoned software engineer with over 2 years of hands-on experience, I excel in both server-side and client-side development. My technical expertise spans across a variety of technologies including React/ React Native, TypeScript, Java, Spring Boot, Flowable, CSS,GraphQL, FastAPI, Terraform, and AWS. I have a Master's in Computer Science from Indiana University Bloomington and a Bachelor's in Information Technology from Anna University. My professional journey includes significant contributions to infrastructure optimization, database operations, and the implementation of RESTful microservices. I am adept at leveraging tools like Spring Boot, Redux, and Next.js to enhance application performance and user experience. Certified in AWS and Azure, I thrive in Agile environments and have a proven track record of driving project success.

education.course_work: Object-Oriented Software Development, Distributed Systems, Cross-platform Mobile Programming, Applied Machine Learning

Algorithm Design & Analysis, Advanced Data structures, Machine Learning Fundamentals, Probability and Statistics, Database Management  systems, Software Engineering, Principles of Operating Systems, Cloud Computing & Virtualization.

projects.title: Flick Match
projects.description: Coordinated a team of three developers, and supervised the UI and integration of new features in the application while troubleshooting issues and tuning the applicationâ€™s performance. Thus enhancing the response time by 24%. Designed the overall web application system architecture while incorporating CI/CD pipelines. Led and implemented server API endpoints along with middleware, and as a database admin, structured data models to satisfy up to 3NF.

projects.title: Distributed Key-Value Store
projects.description: Developed a sophisticated distributed key-value store in Java, employing UDP and Multicast protocols for efficient network communication and leveraging Memcached for enhanced object storage. Engineered to support multiple consistency models including sequential, eventual, linearizability, and causal consistency.

projects.title: FlickMatch
projects.description: Designed ORM using Spring Hibernate and DAO repository layer using JPA Entity Manager. Implemented proactive health-check API, and employed unit testing using JUnit. Caching using AWS ElastiCache for better response time. Utilized Redux library for state management of components and flux architecture for improved scalability. Employed sensors for faster authentication and refined recommendations.

experience.title: Security Operation Intern
mainTech: SSH, Azure, Security Engineering, Network Security
experience.description: Effectively handling tier 1 technical analysis and response for cybersecurity incidents to end users and IT staff. Resolved 40% of backlog tickets by developing a log parser that extracts information needed for rapid tier 1 analysis. Thoroughly trained and acted cautiously to adhere to FREPA regulations and University policies in day-to-day operations.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
mainTech: React.js, Redux, Spring Boot, Spring Cloud (Eureka, Api Gateway)
experience.description: Implemented RESTful microservices using Spring MVC, Spring Cloud, and Redis caching for a State Government Record Management System, enhancing throughput by 40% and achieving 99.99% uptime. Integrated Spring Security with JWT for authentication. Enhanced UI by incorporating lazy loading of React components, improving page load speed by 30%. Designed Redux thunks for async server calls, reducing Total Blocking Time by 150ms. Utilized Hibernate for caching and transaction management. Adopted TTD approach using JUnit, Mockito, and Mocha for unit and integration tests. Leveraged AWS Auto-Scaling and canary testing, reducing cross-feature bugs by 10%.

experience.title: Software Engineer
mainTech: Next.js, Spring Boot, Spring Security, JWT, Spring AOP
experience.description: At AISmart Solutions, I improved SQL query performance, integrated server-side solutions with Spring Boot, and enhanced client-side functionality with Next.js. I also managed infrastructure optimizations, leveraged AWS services for scaling, and adhered to Agile methodologies to boost productivity. My technical expertise includes Java, Spring Framework, React, AWS, and various databases, with a focus on performance optimization and scalable architecture.
